About the Sia Rankings

The Sia rankings board is an opt-in service that Sia users can use to show off how much data they have uploaded to the network. The idea is to provide a platform for open competition between uploaders, competing for the top data usage spot. Users submit their contracts which only contain information about the size of the data they have uploaded, not any of the actual data itself.
